name: Badass Rabbit Wizard
description:
In this game for three players, one of you will be a badass rabbit wizard, one of you will be their customer, and one of you will be the customer’s guide.

The badass rabbit wizard specializes in potions and elixirs. The wizard is incredibly badass, and also a rabbit.

The game begins when the Customer comes into the wizard’s shop with a request for a potion they want the wizard to make.

In every case, the wizard has all the basic ingredients but requires a special ingredient to complete the potion....
